summary: A returning Union Officer discovers that his home has been overrun by Mexican bandits, and infiltrates the gang to restore order and determine if his wife has been faithful to him.
cast: Giuliano Gemma|Fernando Sancho|Lorella De Luca|Nieves Navarro|Antonio Casas|Manuel Muñiz|Mónica Sugranes|Víctor Bayo|Tunet Vila|Juan Torres|Jose Halufi|George Martin|Fernando Di Leo|Frank Oliveras|Montserrat Prous|Duccio Tessari|Ricardo Valor|Rinaldo Zamperla
keywords: johnny ringo|arizona territory|american civil war|u.s. mexico border|italo western
title: El retorno de Ringo
